content: this pattern is simple enough for even a beginner crocheter the pattern includes instructions for two different sizes regular and super wide it is strongly encouraged that you use yarn that is 100% cotton which allows for minimal stretching and is very durable text and photos copyright ©2012 by yarn baby aka my yarn baby all rights reserved pattern is not to be reproduced or shared in any way without written permission finished products may be sold it is greatly appreciated if pattern credit is given to yarn baby at www yarnbaby biz
